overview: Two cartoon elves, Charles and Stone, dance to celebrate their latest bright idea: to tease Lucette, typist by trade. One of the two practical jokers therefore pounces at her, then it’s the turn of his accomplice to pinch the poor woman’s back making her fall…Full of regrets, our two scoundrels decide to offer their victim a Flambo chair: the essential tool for typists to prevent backache.
title: The Martyrdom of the Typist
